name: cloudtribe
description: 順路經濟平台 - 連接真實世界的社群互助平台
author: 張瑞芳

scripts.prod:frontend: cd client && sudo rm -rf .next && npm install && npm run build && pm2 start npm --name "frontend" -- run start
scripts.prod:backend: cd . && source venv/bin/activate && PYTHONPATH=backend pm2 start venv/bin/uvicorn --name fastapi-app --interpreter venv/bin/python3 -- backend.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001
scripts.prod: npm run prod:frontend && npm run prod:backend
scripts.prod:ecosystem: npm run prod:frontend && npm run prod:pm2
